entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump You are a corrupt and fake "President". You've been impeached. You're irrelevant. Sit down, and shut the fuck up. You don't give a shit about people dying from Coronavirus. We all know that. You can't lead, so get the hell out of the way. You're useless. https://t.co/mkekRBhp0K
